title: I Need Direction
description:
Amaya says she's ready to “right the ship” after doing several of the 10 stupid things Dr. Laura warned would mess up her life. - Dr. Laura: "Make guiding your girls into adulthood the primary focus of your life."

Have you done any of the "10 Stupid Things" Dr. Laura warns about in her books? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment. 

Find me on social media at:
